text:
According to <https://blog.HubSpot.com/sales/text-sales-prospects|HubSpot>, _98% of all text messages are opened compared to 22% of emails._

To get a 500% increase in open rates, the new <https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/8354069/marketplace/apps/sales/sales-enablement/leadsigma-237080|LeadSigma Text Message Workflow Custom Action> can be be plugged into your existing workflow automations to help you close more deals faster.

<https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/8354069/marketplace/apps/sales/sales-enablement/leadsigma-237080|Install for free through the HubSpot App Store today>!
Here is a workflow I created in 1 minute to send text messages to leads on a form submission.
